mupit.summary: Designed and developed web-based applications, bioinformatics pipelines, database solutions, and Docker (Virtual machine) images to assist biologists with the analysis of public and private biological data.

responsibilities.code: Aided the In Silico Solutions team collaborating with the Karchin lab at Johns Hopkins University to design and develop the 3D protein variant viewer, MuPIT (Mutation Position Imaging Toolbox).

mupit.imageAlt: MuPIT, Mutation Position Imaging Toolbox, site used for viewing proteins.
